name: Dynalist Clean Navigation
description: Makes Dynalist navigation and menus clean and minimal. Adds whitespace, minimizes color palette, removes ugly shadows and rounded corners for a sleeker, more usable, less distracting Dynalist interface.
additional_info:
Works with any font or font size chosen in settings menu
Works with other userscripts that only effect lists
Does not work with non-default color themes
Does not work with other userscripts that effect navigation or color
